text: <@UFBNA9K9A>?

Quick question but not sure I'm in the right channel, so apologies. I've connected HubSpot to my Wordpress website using the API key in order to add people from the website who subscribe to a newsletter. However, it's not showing all my lists in HubSpot. Is this because the lists in HubSpot are Active and they need to be Static to connect with a website? If they are static, will everyone who subscribes to the newsletter on the website be added constantly?
Hi, you can’t make multiple association with one api call like you said. Why not just making to request of association ?

Hi , *The v3 Engagements API is currently under development, you should fallback on the legacy api*

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/engagements/engagements-overview>

hey <@U01M0M88TT5>,

Yes with this plugin all of your subscribers will be updated to HubSpot.

But HubSpot has feature to track all form submissions even if they are not HubSpot forms, so what i will suggest here if you want to work with active lists is to allow non HubSpot forms tracking and based on the submission you can update your enrolment criteria.  <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/forms/use-non-HubSpot-forms>

Hey! How can we import product image URL using the bulk import api(v3), Currently I am getting a successful response but getting an error in import which is "FAILED_VALIDATION" for product image URL. Please help!!

Not directly, the UI is making multiple calls to connect that data up. You can look up contacts by their email address (which is likely a field on the form submission). You’ll need to make two calls in order to get that info
a power automate solution would solve all this :disappointed:
Postman has some nice tools and they support OAS 3. Might be worth checking out since Microsoft doesn’t support the latest version
I wanted to integrate HubSpot with power automate though
gotcha, I didn’t realize power automate was a thing. I thought it was a category of tool. :flushed:
nono its just what microsoft flow is called now
a microsoft flow/power automate connector would be nice though

Is there a way to see why an API call keeps failing by correlation id? I am using `/v3/objects/contacts/batch/read` and it is working for 9/10 calls but for some reason it keeps failing with a certain payload. It is a 500 error so it does not include what is the issue
I would be skeptical that it is actually the payload.
I have had requests to that endpoint fail consistently for many hours then succeed with no change on my end.
This has happened to me before as well, however, its been 4-5 hours now.
What do you mean?

Hey! Has anyone had success using the CMS pages api to move content from one portal to another? We are experimenting with this, but discovered a lot of discrepancies between what documentation says and what the endpoint actually returns.
I could visibly see how slow it was taking to update the record _count_. This was also showing in production, so it must be a HubSpot thing with Custom Objects.
Quick due-diligence question, but there's no way to use the file manager API to update vidyard properties on HubSpot-hosted videos, correct?

I got the data from contacts: form submissions are there with form `form guid` and `timestamp` (<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/contacts-overview>) and submissions itself are related to a form with `form guid`  and has `timestamp`, but since timestamp might be not uniq, and there is no `conversion-id` provided with submissions - is there a way match submissions from contacts API and submissions from forms API?
in case of 500 error juste retry , sometimes it happen, for ration issue for exemple
Make one request to associate the deal with the contact and another on for the deal with the company
